summary: This is a mod that adds a Khajiit follower named HLaar. Based off of my Skyrim Xbox360 charcter HLaar. (There is an apostrophe in his name but the nexus glitches out when I place one here).
descriptionHtml:
I don't have much on a backstory for H'Laar yet but it's in the works. He is the long lost brother of my current Skyrim PC character R'Kiia.

The installation guide, uninstallation guide, and where to find him are all in a Read Me.txt file within the download.

Also check out my YouTube channel at either of the links below. Thanks!.
[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQuqYT6P_IiQkU-L9UfQR3w]https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQuqYT6P_IiQkU-L9UfQR3w[/url]
or
[url=https://www.youtube.com/user/wialord]https://www.youtube.com/user/wialord[/url]
author: wialord
